verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Search me O God and
know my heart today
Try me O Savior
Know my thoughts I pray

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
See if there be
Some wicked way in me
Cleanse me from every sin
And set me free

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I praise Thee Lord
For cleansing me from sin
Fulfill Thy Word and
Make me pure within

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Fill me with fire where
Once I burned with shame
Grant my desire to
Magnify Thy Name

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Lord take my life
And make it wholly Thine
Fill my poor heart with
Thy great love divine

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Take all my will
My passion self and pride
I now surrender Lord
In me abide

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
O Holy Ghost revival
Comes from Thee
Send a revival
Start the work in me

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Thy Word declares
Thou wilt supply our need
For blessings now
O Lord I humbly plead
